detail_desc: Blouse in a shimmering patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves in a double layer.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Metal curb chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a padlock. Length 51 cm. Size of padlock 2x2 cm.
Longjohns with an elasticated waist and flatlock seams. Made from fast-drying functional fabric designed to keep you warm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Large, round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. The plastic content of the frames is made partly from recycled PET bottles.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Jumper in an inside-out, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Short, fitted dress in slightly stretchy fabric with a deep V-neck at the front, a V-neck at the back and a zip down the front. Unlined.
Dress in a textured weave with a short, frilled collar and covered buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a skirt with a frill trim at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline, one dropped shoulder, buttons down one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform front approx. 3 cm, heel 6 cm.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a slight sheen. Layered at the top with a wide flounce that covers one shoulder. Gathered seam at one side for a draped effect and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the other side. Jersey lining.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Twill trousers with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with slits at the hems for a gently flared effect.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in fluted, crinkled fabric with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side panels and a small print on one leg. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a pocket with a taped zip at one side. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. Slipover in a textured knit with a V-neck.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep neckline at the back and adjustable shoulder straps. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and extra-high-cut legs with cutaway coverage at the back.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed ties at one side and a belt with D-rings at the other.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button.
Wide blouse in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, gathers and buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long, cuffed sleeves.
Soft, non-wired bralette in mesh and lace with mesh-lined cups, double adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Oversized top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. High, adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and narrow hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood that wraps over slightly at the front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket with corozo nut buttons and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Tailored shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Slim fit over the thighs with side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides.
Short top in sturdy jersey with long sleeves, cut-out sections at the sides and wide elastication at the hem.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Striped jumper knitted in a soft cashmere blend in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Puff pants in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and rounded hem.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short flounced sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam with ties at the waist. Partly lined.
Knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, belt and metal buckle. Buttons down the front, side pockets and back pockets. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, fake pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Sandals in imitation leather with crossover foot straps. Linings and lightly padded insoles in imitation leather, and fluted soles.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch wool weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Longer, straight-cut jacket in jacquard-weave viscose with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and fringing at the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a high waist with a wide waistband, and straight wide legs with ribbed hems.
Headband in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the front. Width 9 cm.
Short blouse in a patterned weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with scalloped edges, and ties at the front of the hem.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Top in jersey crêpe with dropped shoulders, long, cuffed sleeves, and a decorative tie detail at the hem.
Imitation suede loafers with decorative studs and a grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jersey hair elastics without metal clips.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and a sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Two flounces around the neckline, and horizontal ties across the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lace collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Leather ankle boots with low heels, pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.
Short skirt in a cotton and linen weave with broderie anglaise. Concealed zip in one side, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Sleeveless lace dress with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a narrow elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist and a wide, lace trim at the hem. Jersey lining.
Matt opaque tights with a control top to hold in the tummy and bum. 100 denier.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Short dress in a soft rib knit with short sleeves and a flared skirt.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Set with three glittery Alice bands, three pairs of glittery hair clips and ten hair elastics.
Straight-cut shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
